title: News: Death Grips announce two full length albums for 2012
content:
Our prayers have been answered.

Around twenty minutes ago the Vomit-Hop group, (just came up with that), Death Grips announced they will be dropping 2 full length records this year, the first of which will be released this April. After the success of Exmilitary is was only a matter of time before we saw a follow up, but such an abundance of music coming over the horizon seemed unthinkable.

WE.ARE.EXCITED.

Stream the announcement video below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
